txt.en: 'You have slain a high ranking lieutenant of Seregost? I praise you for your valiant efforts.'

'Atop the perilous peak of Mount Doom is a neglected road. There may be mineral riches to be had on this path, though the journey there is not an easy one. If we are to construct a new watch over this realm, we will need the hardened minerals of the mountain. Are you willing to take on this task?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest. This quest can be completed with one or two adventurers.</rgb>
Mineral riches await those who brave the perilous cliff road circling Mount Doom.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to Candúr and apprise him of your efforts.
